lenders.name: Allison
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are one world and credit should not be an statement of privilege.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the non-profit world, trying to improve how organizations and create better ways to help those who in need.

lenders.name: peter
lenders.occupation: legal recuriter & owner of EMC SEARCH
lenders.loan_because: It is the way to win over the world.  This is a foreign policy that works.

lenders.name: Juanita
lenders.loan_because: I need to make a difference in the world
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of 3 and a grandmother of 2

lenders.name: Canadian Tool and Supply
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful for all  the chances I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: Distribution of tools and industrial supplies.

lenders.name: Caroline
lenders.loan_because: I can, because I believe in human determination, because I believe in empowering people, because I just believe in people... just because...

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: women of the world need empowerment.

lenders.name: Dave & Terri
lenders.loan_because: We have seen what these small loans can do to help people.  We first became aware of them while working in Dhaka, Bangladesh.  Our daughter introduced us to Kiva.
lenders.occupational_info: We were school teachers in various countries around the world:  Taiwan, Singapore, Indonesia, Czech Rep., Egypt, Bangladesh.

lenders.name: Tatsuo
lenders.loan_because: kiva offers me great opportunities to help people who needs help.
lenders.occupational_info: do research and education in a university.

lenders.name: Sherrill
lenders.loan_because: My daughter introduced me to KIVA- to help others.

lenders.name: Bob and Ann
lenders.loan_because: We have been fortunate to have good jobs and a steady income. It is time to share with others in need
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Internal Medicine department at the Naval Hospital Pensacola, Florida in the United States. Most of my patients are retired military and over the age of 50.

lenders.name: Paula
lenders.loan_because: I like to pay it forward...
lenders.occupational_info: I help people design and build surroundings in which they can enjoy their friends and family.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: Each one reach one!
lenders.occupational_info: Care, Confidence and Connection through Horses.  We reach out to kids and connect with them through our horses.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people get their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am 10 years old and in elementary school.

lenders.name: Loralyn
lenders.loan_because: What might seem like a small amount of money to me can have a huge impact on someone else's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in graduate school studying to be a microbiology professor and researcher.

lenders.name: Paquette Family
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others, especially women,  to make a better life for themselves and their families
lenders.occupational_info: I train employees in the company where I work, to perform their job responsibilities safely and efficiently.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I can.  What feels like a small loan to me can make a large difference.  Bravo Kiva!  May all the entrepreneurs on this site continue to be courageous & prosperous.
lenders.occupational_info: My wife Lauren & I founded Wisdomology.com to help promote personal and planetary peace.  It's an amazing community of people all over the world who are sharing the wisdom of their lives.  I invite you to join us!

lenders.name: Michele
lenders.loan_because: After traveling and meeting so many people working hard to survive, I realized it only took a little support and love to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I assist the employees of my company in improving their skills and talents in the workplace and as individuals.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the idea - and it helps put things in perspective when I get stressed about money.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It's a small but powerful way for me to positively change someone's world for good.

lenders.name: Howard
lenders.loan_because: I love all people.
lenders.occupational_info: Help people in need of public assistance through government programs.

lenders.name: Helen
lenders.occupation: Retired administrator with State of Ohio

lenders.name: Robin
lenders.occupational_info: I help take care of the costumes used onstage in the Broadway (New York City) musical The Lion King (as well as some other shows). In addition to doing repairs and such, I help the actors get into & out of the costumes during the show.

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: My stepdaughter gave me the Monther's Day gift of being able to help other women financially.  I think this could be addictive!
lenders.occupational_info: I help families protect their lifestyes and their abillity to recieve quality care when they neeed help to just get through the day by designing an insurance policy to cover their future expenses for  care.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I have seen poverty in Africa first-hand and understand the need to develop an entrepreneurial spirit so that people can have pride & dignity in looking after their families. Life is very diffocult for women in Third World Countries, yet they continue to strive endlesly to improve life for themselves and their families. They deserve a helping hand from those who are more fortunate.

lenders.name: Jeanette
lenders.loan_because: I received a wonderful Mother's Day gift from our son, Michael... a Kiva gift certificate!!!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I received a Kiva gift certificate for mother's day 2008.  I love seeing the faces and reading the stories of the people that are working to make  better lives for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: Nelson
lenders.loan_because: I make loans to help other people out, and I find it rewarding. I also made one loan as a Mother's Day gift.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a computer to design structure for jets.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I was informed about the program through a Cultures class at my highschool, and I want to be that one chance that ever person in this world should get with a simple loan.

lenders.name: Pay It Forward
lenders.loan_because: we want to be of service to our global community and become personally involved in our world by financially assisting those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a school organization working with students who are interested in making a difference in the world and becoming civic-minded leaders.

lenders.name: Gloria
lenders.loan_because: I would like to help someone else to get started, the way I would like to have someone help me if I needed it.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but I do volunteer work.  I have always enjoyed working very much.

lenders.name: Angie
lenders.loan_because: This starts as a 40th birthday gift from my friends and family.  It is truly a gift that keeps on giving.  I want to BE the change that I want to see in the world.

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: "I wondered why somebody didn't do something.  Then I realized, I am somebody."
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a local Outreach that among many things,  assists people with rent, utilities, food, and clothing.

lenders.name: Jacob & Dana
lenders.loan_because: we know that the first few hundred dollars is always the hardest, but once you get started, nothing can stop you.
lenders.occupational_info: Jake is an attorney and project manager at a non-profit real estate development company in Camden, NJ. Dana is a public relations specialist working for a national PR firm based in Los Angeles

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the daily operations at a golf course. I also teach to help improve the ability of my clients.

lenders.name: Madge
lenders.loan_because: It's a good cause and they really help people with almost all money going to the people who need it and not to run the organization.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an artist who paints abstract paintings and a mixed media artist.

lenders.name: Svetlana & Daryl
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people live better.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to the children of immigrants and Daryl is a computer developer.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: The gift just keeps on giving!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Chicago-based consultant helping people to better market and/or sell their products and services.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: i got loan money as a mother's day gift.What a great idea to be able to"mother" some other folks in need of a helping hand
lenders.occupational_info: I  am a ceramics teacher.I teach kids from 3-18 and their moms handbuilding and potters wheel techniques.We all have a great time making a mess

lenders.name: Bonnie
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs help sometime in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a shop that sells plants and flowers.

lenders.name: dr. martin
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is happiness!

lenders.name: _h_
lenders.occupational_info: thinking & writing & teaching

lenders.name: Duane
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.  I believe if we all are each others customers we will never go to war.  With that in mind I want to help people improve their lives through business ownership.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide people with the opportunity to improve their lives through business ownership.

lenders.name: Robert Harbin-McGee
lenders.loan_because: Giving is essential. Many people have helped me throughout my life. I think & believe we are all One - We are all in this together. No matter what our backgrounds, lifestyles, circumstances: Each one of us is just one strand in the fabric of humanity - We are all connected in this way - We all matter. When I assist another - it is my brother, or my sister . If my assistance is useful, wanted, needed, and effective - we all benefit.
lenders.occupational_info:
Due to medical reasons, I can no longer work - but that does not mean I can not remain useful, productive, and do what I can to assist others. My passions include Music; "The healing effects of music"; Horticulture and Environmentally Friendly and Conscientious Landscape Design.
Contributing in ways that empower others. Patient Advocacy - Registered Nursing

lenders.name: Nadine
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the chance to become successful on their own terms.
lenders.occupational_info: I tell people in my community about local problems and solutions, and invite them to become involved in making it a better place for us all to live in by donating money or time.

lenders.name: Mary Ruth
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me a gift certificate for Mother's Day in order to make a loan.  What a wonderful gift for Mother's day - to have a daughter whose heart reaches out to others.  My heart is blessed, and I am grateful for the opportunity to share.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: we are all in this together.

lenders.name: Entrepreneurial Mom
lenders.loan_because: It's nice to help others realize their dreams, support the creative business spirit and improve the lives of children
lenders.occupational_info: Every Mom knows what I do all day!

lenders.name: Christian
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people and I believe in micro-loans.

lenders.name: Brenda
lenders.loan_because: ... because I can

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of entrepreneurism at its most grass-roots level.  I loan because my spare change can so deeply affect for the good the lives of others.  I loan because I care for those less fortunate than I.  I loan because, but for the grace of God, there go I.
lenders.occupational_info: Economic development at the municipal level;  Downtown and Industrial development;  Business attraction and Retention.  Starting a Business.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: it's more satisfying than low interest rates.
lenders.occupational_info: A bit of everything ... Look for a better way to direct capital to support more efficient social investing.

lenders.name: Andy and Nicky
lenders.loan_because: Everybody needs stuff
lenders.occupational_info: I repair machines in a huge steel factory and she cleans up after messy americans

lenders.name: Sandy
lenders.loan_because: As a former teacher in home economics my interest was always in sewing.  I started my own small business (costume design) on small business loans and now that I've retired I want to help others with their own small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I continue to sew and do alterations on the vintage clothing I am selling.  I am also starting a small sewing school for teens and young adults who want to learn to sew.

lenders.name: grüvr ticket scout
lenders.loan_because:
Spread the Culture of Peace and enable people helping people via directly - globally.

We are interested in funding people who craft musical instruments and helping to market them on the internet, please get in touch!
lenders.occupational_info:
Our website helps people find local small concerts - the music people make for each other --  right next door. 

We are the only site to offer 'name your price'  concert tickets ... so check it out - we're donating some of our profits  to kiva projects.

Music brings people together.

PEACE!

lenders.name: Mona
lenders.loan_because: it`s about justice and hope.

lenders.name: Kathrin
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the effectiveness of microlending.

lenders.name: Letty
lenders.loan_because: My daughter gave me the money that I loned as a gift for mother's day last year.  I will continue to reloan her gift as long as Kiva exists.  Her gift to me will hopefully help someone manifest their dreams.  This is what giving is all about.  My daughter's gift to me has helped me manifest one of my dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Office work.  Not very exciting but it pays the bills.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: MicroLoans work when large aid programs don't.

lenders.name: Sipra
lenders.loan_because: We need to help each other through life with love and sharing.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people stretch their bodies and calm their minds so that they feel good, taking away aches and stresses from their daily being through Yoga. I help people to cook healthy and delicious foods. I also do Reiki, which is healing aches through gentle touch.

lenders.name: Betsy
lenders.loan_because: My son, David, introduced me to KIVA and sent me a gift certificate for Mother's Day.  I've always loved helping people and this is a wonderful opportunity to do so.
lenders.occupational_info: For 34 years I've enjoyed  helping people sell their homes and find new homes.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has a purpose and can contribute something to the world.  I want to help them.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to make something of themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I help young people at school every day!

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: My son gave me this gift of Kiva for Mother's Day and I look forward to helping someone who wants to make a better life for themselves and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I am presently volunteering with a local hospital and enjoy my work.

lenders.name: Alice & Mom
lenders.loan_because: My Mother's Day gift from son

lenders.name: Cristina
lenders.loan_because: It's a small way that I feel that I can help the people that need it most.
lenders.occupational_info: I feed people!

lenders.name: Anthony
lenders.loan_because: I can...  If a Waiter can do this as a simple server, you can too.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: It is effective.  What more can be asked of small acts but that they be effective?

lenders.name: Belgian
lenders.loan_because: I realize how many opportunities we get thrown into our lap just because we were born in a rich country, that others have to work hard for.
lenders.occupational_info:
I keep a travel blog about Belgium,
with information about beer, museums, partying, nature, chocolate, fashion ...

lenders.name: Andrew Dergousoff
lenders.loan_because: I understand the dreams, struggles and sacrifices that come along with being an entrepreneur. Living in Canada has afforded me access to resources that might not be available to other entrepreneurs in developing countries. I would like to help people with big dreams to pursue their ambitions.
lenders.occupational_info: At International Conference Services, our passion is organizing superior conferences, events and incentive programs. It is our aim to Inspire, Create and Succeed alongside our clients while providing unique, world class experiences.

lenders.name: SunnyRaindrops
lenders.loan_because: it's the least I can do. God has blessed me so much and in so many ways and even though I'm not rich by American standards I am so excited to be able to help others out with their dreams!
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a souvenir shop.

lenders.name: Lynda
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women helping women is a small way that I can help to empower and change a life for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher's assistant, and I work in an elementary classroom with students that struggling with their learning.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I'm trying to reverse gender inequality by empowering women through economic opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I study a lot! I'm also the co-founder of a group called University of Oregon Students for Global Health, which  strives to raise awareness of preventable diseases (mainly AIDS, malaria and tuberculosis) and raises funds for an organization called Partners in Health (PIH).

lenders.name: Sheila
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have a chance to succeed in life.  I have economic students that help me collect pennies every semester to loan to Kiva entrepreneurs.  They like to be a part of making the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students economics and sociology.

lenders.name: Carrie and Robert
lenders.loan_because:
This portfolio is kept in memory of  Carrie (1939 - 2008).  Carrie went through more than anyone should have to as a child, but always maintained a positive outlook and zeal for life - learning, traveling and helping others.   Her unrelenting spirit for life was an inspiration to all who knew her.    
Carrie wanted this portfolio to help women around the world who were taking care of their children and involved in agriculture or food production.  Being an orphan herself and a volunteer teaching art to children in orphanages, I know Carrie would also find a personal joy in assisting women who have taken in orphans.

lenders.name: Ardis
lenders.loan_because: My daughter made me aware of a wonderful way to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired but enjoying a full life as a wife, mother, grandmother and great-grandmother.

lenders.name: william
lenders.loan_because: It is by far the most effective international aid mechanism.
lenders.occupational_info: I evaluate how pollutants move through groundwater and research methods for producing clean water.

lenders.name: Alise
lenders.loan_because: I care...
lenders.occupational_info: Be an individual under Gods' direction...to proclaim the gospel to all possible, in every way, everywhere...encouraging the who-so-evers to evaluate the spiritual aspect of their lives, and make sure they have been born again  {asking God the Father  in Jesus Christ name, to forgive you for all sin, invite Him into your heart and guide your life by His spirit...ensuring your eternal destiny.  I enjoy seeing others prosper and be in health also, therefore if I can help my fellowman in all ways possible...GREAT.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people working toward a goal and trying to improve things.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on projects that involve green technology and transportation.

lenders.name: Ransom Family
lenders.loan_because: we want to learn about and help people all over the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Building computer technologies for small businesses.

lenders.name: Chris and Joe
lenders.loan_because: we understand the power of financing
lenders.occupational_info: we are students of medicine.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others continue to lift themselves up and really know in their hearts that what they need is on the way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a bookkeeper for 3 small businesses - a construction company, a chocolate company (yum!)  and a marketing group.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I wish to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I answer the phone and pass the caller on to the correct person

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserve an opportunity to better ones life.

lenders.name: Rosemarie
lenders.loan_because: because we all should think of more than ourselves.

lenders.name: Lucy
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is more than providing money.  It's showing the folks who borrow that there are people who care about them and are rooting for them to succeed in business and in life.  This can be as uplifting and uniting as any aspect of the program.  Also, I think the program promotes social justice and access to a decent life and through this peace and understanding.
lenders.occupational_info: I bring amusement, laughter, warmth, and companionship to my human housemates.  This lifts their spirits, reduces their stress, boosts their immune system, and helps them keep their petty concerns in perspective.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because:
I want the poor to prosper.
I want a fairer world.
I want the world to live in community.
lenders.occupational_info: I make medicine out of herbs and use cups, needles, and oils to make people better.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: It is a necessary part of expressing my gratitude for the good life I have.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my family and help my local school district apply for funding through grant applications.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people less fortunate than myself
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an aerospace engineer.

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: I feel like it gives me a connection to people around the world and encourages me to learn more about where they live. I think Kiva is a great idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I do web development and manage information technology services for a manufacturing company in st louis.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: caring for people

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I hope this will make the world a smaller place.  I exclusively loan to people manufacturing or selling liquor, or dealing with goats in some manner.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I am a small-business owner myself, and like to support others across the world doing the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people who have muscular injuries, and help them to get better.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I am a mom and want other moms to be able to care for their children with dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a school that helps college students learn how to become teachers for very young children.

lenders.name: Wilson
lenders.loan_because: we're all in this together

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe we are all connected !!

lenders.name: suzanne
lenders.loan_because: Because the Lord loves a cheerful giver.  Because I have so much.  Because they have so little.  Because for what it costs to feed my cat I can change someone's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do administrative social work specializing in a feeding program for home day care settings.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: it's wonderful to be able to help people directly, even in this small way.  Today I joined and made three loans in honor of my mother, Thelma Carter, who died in 1997, and who cared so much about helping people throughout the world better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for  an organization that promotes international educational and cultural exchange.

lenders.name: SOPHIA
lenders.loan_because: there is no other choice

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: We all need to help others less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a manufacturing company. I support network, hardware, and software issues within the company.

lenders.name: chris
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving back and helping others who are trying to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach teenagers in a school of 1250 students.  I have taught English, careers, foods, nutrition, parenting, physical education, and health.

lenders.name: Dale and Kathy
lenders.loan_because: We are so blessed in life. We have a great marriage, wonderful children and grandchildren, a home and health.  We just want to bless others in every way we can.

lenders.name: Barrett
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are helping themselves under difficult circumstances.
lenders.occupational_info: I help others learn how to communicate better about their work, so they can get good jobs and succeed.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: My daughter got me started with a Mother's Day gift.  Great gift...Great daughter!

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a small firm that partners with US and state-level governments to conduct research on the impact and effectiveness of publicly funded programs in health and education.  Currently working on a project to evaluate the impact and effectiveness of a federally funded program in increasing the quantity and quality of HIV primary medical care available in areas heavily impacted by HIV/AIDS.

lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.occupational_info: I type and publish technical manuals to fix airplanes.

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: After a life changing trip volunteering in Guatemala, I realized that we can make a real difference in the lives of others.  I am always looking for ways to to do that.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the mother of four children and I work part-time at a coffee shop.

lenders.name: sanjar
lenders.loan_because: God is the reason why I loan! I know I was born to impact many lives in this world cause that's my purpose.
lenders.occupational_info: I m an individual who owns a business that develops leaders!  Leaders that bring destroyed families together, help young and older generations to understand the true meaning of honor, integrity, responsibility and most importantly understand not "who" we are but "WHOSE" we are!

lenders.name: Robert and Izzy
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves.

lenders.name: Signe
lenders.loan_because: I like to give people a chance to build something
lenders.occupational_info: I work at The Aid Agency, an advertising agency in Copenhagen. We focus on awakening consumers who (like ourselves) want to change the world by supporting sustainable brands/products.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: There but for the grace of God go I.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a big company to help people do better in their work and feel happy about their work.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I am grateful that I am able to help others aroung the globe, especially weavers and sewers.
lenders.occupational_info: I am unable to work due to back injury.

lenders.name: Mark and Mary Kay
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do in a global community.
lenders.occupational_info: We work with children so that they might reach their own potential.

lenders.name: Azule Navarre
lenders.loan_because: It is better to give a hand up than a hand out. We in the US are so blessed it is not only our privilege but our moral obligation to give back to those who have less.
lenders.occupational_info: I design websites.

lenders.name: LuAnn
lenders.loan_because: A relative gave me a gift certificate, The best gift I can imagine!
lenders.occupational_info: Branch Manager of Financial Institution. I provide education and help people achieve financial goals. I also farm. I raise sheep and grass hay.

lenders.name: Matt Murphy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a fitness instructor and a personal trainer.  I am also a high school coach of American Football.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: to help others in the world
lenders.occupational_info: shop assistant

lenders.name: Trent
lenders.loan_because: Good people have invested in me.  I hope to do the same for others.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is what Jesus would have me do.
lenders.occupational_info: primary school teacher

lenders.name: Margeaux
lenders.loan_because: I want to build capital by investing in the people's futures.
lenders.occupational_info: I help expand the charter school movement to provide better, high quality school options for children in California.

lenders.name: Dolf
lenders.loan_because: I truly believe in the power of being able to make other people's dreams of self reliance through owning their own business a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with local people in Bali, Indonesia, creating opportunities for exporting local arts and crafts to the rest of the world.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: it's in my brother who passed away last October

lenders.name: Jessikah
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference. I want to help someone better their life and do good for themselves. I believe that the littlest things can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a server (waitress). It can be hard and frustrating at times, but can also be pretty fun at the same time.

lenders.name: anju
lenders.loan_because: i believe in helping others
lenders.occupational_info: to listen and find solutions for people

lenders.name: Mike & Kathy Storey
lenders.loan_because: we realize how fortunate we are to be Canadians. we want to make it possible for others to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: We belong to Rotary and our Rotary motto is service above self. This is one of the things that we can do to help make this a better world.

lenders.name: Yuvaraja Subramaniam
lenders.loan_because: Somebody needs a loan and I have been fortunate enough to have some money to lend
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for Investment banks, Hedge funds and other financial institutions

lenders.name: Efosa
lenders.loan_because: The only difference between meand someone living in poverty is the fact that I was born into affluence and they weren't. And I had absolutely nothing to do with that. Knowing this, how can I not?

lenders.name: Nutrition & Hunger 139
lenders.loan_because: Our student group at San Jose State cares about nutrition and we want to see these families given the opportunity to expand their nutritional resources.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a group of over 30 San Jose State University Students who
are enrolled in Nutrition & Environmental Hunger (139)

lenders.name: Óttar
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I design biomass boilers

lenders.name: Jenny
lenders.loan_because: Most lasting changes start at the grassroots level.  Ending poverty means looking carefully at wealth.  If we have much and our neighbors have little, we are called on behalf of love to give to them.
lenders.occupational_info: Research to develop a vaccine or drug treatment for a parasite called leishmania

lenders.name: Marthinus en Sonja
lenders.loan_because: we want to make a better future for outselfes and others,we currently have a kitchen in a pub & grill that we are leasing from the owner ,we do good but we want to improve our services and give more work to those that does not have something to put on their tables for themselfes and their children - Thanks for your support - GOD BLESS
lenders.occupational_info: Long hours and Hard

lenders.name: Smári
lenders.loan_because: The idea of microfinance is an absurdly good one and I'm glad somebody managed to implement it in a relatively secure, relatively peer-to-peer way. I'll do what I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I organize projects regarding digital fabrication, peer-to-peer education and grassroots innovation in an attempt to break the current models of assumption that are manufacturing poverty and inequality on a global scale... amongst other things.

lenders.name: Kitty
lenders.loan_because: Our oldest son gave me a $25 certificate as a present one year and I have continued to lend it back, time after time.  Thank you for this opportunity!

lenders.name: Del
lenders.loan_because: It is the right thing to do and it is fun to watch people succeed!
lenders.occupational_info: I manage 8 Estate Wineries in Canada.  We specialize in Icewine.

lenders.name: Jeannette
lenders.loan_because: Kiva offers an amazing way to fight poverty through peer-to-peer microloans. Genius!
lenders.occupational_info: Scribe Marketing, Inc., offers a creative, critical approach to marketing with an emphasis on quality content.

lenders.name: Vivian
lenders.loan_because: When I was younger I worked very hard to better the lives of women in my own country.  But it was always my wish to also reach out to  women in other countries, I just was never sure how to best do so.  I was so happy to hear of this organization on the radio, just what I had in mind.  Thank you so much for creating such a wonderful organization. I know how much of yourselves you put into it.

lenders.name: Tisha
lenders.loan_because: sometimes we all need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: Down to earth and artsy- glass, clay, and gardening.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people setting up and expanding their business.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software for chess tournaments.

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I feel we all need to give back in any way we can, be it big or small.

lenders.name: Shari
lenders.loan_because: I don't have the time (or money!) available to go to somewhere like Honduras, Kenya, or Senegal to help with someone's pickling, plumbing, or textile business myself. Making a loan makes helping out easy.
lenders.occupational_info: Writing, typing, scribbling, etc.

lenders.name: KansasKate
lenders.loan_because: I can.  And you can, too.

lenders.name: margaret
lenders.loan_because: My sister invited me to this website and inspired me, and I believe in helping people - especially women - improve their lives and their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teachers - we help one another become even better at getting students at our school to learn and grow.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: Growing up myself in a developing beautiful country island such as the Dominican Republic i know the struggles and sacrifices that underprivileged and dedicated families go through to feed and support their own. I also find that my good deeds are always repaid double somehow. And it also makes me feel that I have contributed in someway in bettering this sometimes unkind world we all live in, even if it's only a little bit at a time.

lenders.name: zenith
lenders.loan_because: I have been truly blessed in my life and would like to share my good fortune.  It also provides a good example in helping my children grow into compassionate and individuals.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: It takes so little to change someone's life.

lenders.name: Kit
lenders.loan_because: I want to help.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage customer service people at a water utility company in California, USA.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to have a spare $25 every now and then.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a starving graduate student. If I have $25 here and there, anyone does.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I don't have much money to help others. With KIVA, my contribution, combined with the conributions of others, can make a real difference in a person's life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach World History and World Geography to 14, 15, and 16 year old high school students.

lenders.name: Teppei
lenders.loan_because: I want to see improving business and happy.

lenders.name: Dolores
lenders.loan_because: My family and I are very fortunate to have the means to be able to help others.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: I believe in providing people the means to pull themselves out of poverty if they're prepared to work. And I know life can be very tough so I'm happy if I can be of help. All the best in your enterprises!
lenders.occupational_info: I run development teams providing  specialised software for the financial markets.

lenders.name: Marysol
lenders.loan_because: I believe that businesses help improve a country's economy by providing for income, jobs, expansion, etc.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at the MGM Grand Hotel & Casino in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. I take the hotel phone calls and transfer to the correct departments/guests.

lenders.name: Bess & Milagro
lenders.occupational_info: I am currently a secretary, but I am studying to become a Math and Spanish teacher.

lenders.name: Lesley
lenders.loan_because: It is one way to make a difference to a community, and to promote education.    And it is a way of giving thanks.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I've been very lucky in my life, spread the love even if it's a little at a time and to who you choose.

lenders.name: Faleaana
lenders.loan_because: We should all have a servant's heart :)
lenders.occupational_info: Office job...enough said

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to provide medical care to sick and injured people in emergency situations.

lenders.name: Deja
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others who are trying to support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I help kids stay out of trouble and hold them accountable for their actions.

lenders.name: patricia
lenders.loan_because: inspiration and empowerment is contagious

lenders.name: sisters hairdressing
lenders.loan_because: professional am a hairdresser am ust doing it in my house in mombasa and am trying to find ashop but it expensive with family to raise .i bought a sewing machine to help me with some money and tried to purchase some equipment it helps.anyway am trying to open my own shop and train people .like droupouts and women .this my goal.
lenders.occupational_info: am a a hairdresser for 10 years doing it in the house and planning to get a shop and some dryers and styling chairs and sinks.to start a class and train young generation and women .i bought already a sewing machine and trying to buy more and train young girls too how to sew so they can develop in themselves.

lenders.name: Rick & Liz
lenders.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help hard-working people in other parts of the world.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: If you are not part of the solution, you  are part of the problem.

lenders.name: Ferdie & Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: We wish to help others that are not so fortunate, so that they can achieve something more for themselves.It is our responsibilty to lift and help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: Automotive Business

lenders.name: Damien
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with abundance. Tikkun alam.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a daily newspaper journalist since 1968.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: it makes me feel good to help people who are working so hard and just need a little boost.  We've all needed a boost in our lives at some time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am spending time recuperating from an illness and moving from one house to another.  I have just sent my fifth child off to college - three are now on their own and two are still in school.  I am the proudest mother of all!  Family is very important.

lenders.name: Abdulla
lenders.loan_because:
An-Nisa (Women)
In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful
O mankind! Be careful of your duty to your Lord Who created you from a single soul and from it created its mate and from them twain hath spread abroad a multitude of men and women. (QURAN CHAPTER 4: Verse 1)... if we were all created from a single soul..then we are all ONE...
lenders.occupational_info:
give a little back (ita not yours after all)
you owe it to you brothers and sisters
we all need a lending hand
to make the world a better place

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: Anytime I think I am struggling, I realize I have it so much better than so many people.  My giving up the cost of one meal out to help another person survive is an amazing opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with banks to create reports about their customers and their accounts.

lenders.name: Trinh & Van Anh
lenders.loan_because:
"This could be me in another life
In another set of circumstances"
lenders.occupational_info: Delivering smiles

lenders.name: Marg Swan Shulman
lenders.loan_because: I feel fortunate and want to share some of what I have with other hard working individuals.  I hope that I can help them achieve their goals just like I did.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who want to help themselves and to follow the example of the man who won the Nobel Prize for starting the micro-loan business in India.
lenders.occupational_info: I write and do a little publishing of books for young people and  also create sculptures.

lenders.name: Tim & Aubrey
lenders.loan_because: access to capital is essential to relieving poverty!

lenders.name: Leena
lenders.loan_because: God blesses us so that we share his abundance. Whatever I give I always get back in many ways--that is how the world was intended to work :)

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital from Foreign Direct Investment allows individuals help themselves without government beauracracy and corruption.  The more people are able to stand on their own through markets and rule of law, subnational violence and transnational terrorism will disappear.  This would achieve my goal of world piece with the Pentagon as a museum that the world would visit as a memorial for all who have sacraficed for a better tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: I loan for deserving, hardworking individuals desiring change for themselves, their family, their country, and the world.

lenders.name: Endurance
lenders.loan_because: no one controls their initial endowment but we can all shape our future. As I continue to learn more about this plight of life I realize it is my duty to help and my gift to give. It is not someone else's problem; It is our shared dilemma. One that, through religion, color, or ideal will bring us together; as the same God watches over all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: I do this very thing everyday. I lend money to people. I work for a bank. It is a desk job. I don't see the sun for a majority of the day or breathe fresh air. I look at a computer screen and do math on people and companies to try and figure out if they have the necessary cash flow and integrity to repay loaned money. It is not physically-demanding only mentally draining.

lenders.name: Nadia ML
lenders.loan_because: it empowers motivated individuals to follow their dreams and become financially self-sufficient, which in turn strengthens entire families, communities and eventually, our world.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense to support micro businesses in poverty stricken areas of the world.

lenders.name: Britt
lenders.loan_because: Our class raised money for kiva.org by hosting a silent auction where we sold murals that we made which depicted the world.  We want to help people improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Our class focuses on service learning because through this we are able to have a greater understanding of other communities and cultures, it helps give us a greater global sense.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell houses.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: of Jesus.
lenders.occupational_info: preaching Jesus.  comforting the afflicted, afflicting the comfortable.

lenders.name: Juan
lenders.loan_because:
i am a certified English teacher. Learning English has been my passion since I was a child, and my interests kept growing as traveling to many countries.
I visited many developped countries and I realized that there are many things we could improve here in Peru. Peru is a beautiful country filled with riches and natural resources although there is a lot of poverty here. My dream is to make a living and at the same time helping others improving Education, Hygiene,etc
As an English educator and other languages as well.

lenders.name: Zusatzveranstaltung Eng
lenders.occupational_info: We would like to show friends of us, how easy it is to support entrepreneurs from all over the world, especially from less developed countries, to empowering them to lift themselfs out of poverty. We ask you for a small donation of less than 1 Euro, which we will be collecting and transfering it up to our Kiva's account.

lenders.name: Lene
lenders.occupational_info: Single mom - 2 children aged 16  and 17

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I beleive everyone should have the opportunity to make dreams a reality.  I have been afforded the opportunity of education and a good job to support my family.  I wish to give others the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a college and have the privelage/opportunity to watch young minds expand in their thinking and open up to new information and opportunities.

lenders.name: swamp3r
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help out and know that your money is directly helping an individual achieve their goals/dreams.

lenders.name: Karin Wells
lenders.loan_because: I have enough to meet my needs and am glad to be able to share with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I paint pictures. You can see them at http://www.KarinWells.com and also at http://www.Oilpnt.com

lenders.name: Brianne
lenders.loan_because: As a citizen of the United States, it's my responsibility.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to provide an opportunity for others to be able to succeed and hopefully, this shall encourage them to help other people in return.
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of a team that provides engineering operations support to a local critical care hospital.

lenders.name: Maja
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people in a worthy way without making them feel ashamed or too thankful for what is little for me. They should achieve what they work for.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for a newspaper. I write texts about what happens in my city and the region where I live - which is Northern Germany. I also work for a regional radio station.

lenders.name: Moira and Allan
lenders.loan_because: We first heard of Kiva when we were given a gift certificate.  We like this way of supporting entrepreneurs as we can follow their progress and share in their success  as they show how their businesses are working through their ability to pay back their loan and so make it available for someone else.  We believe this is an empowering way of supporting small business people in challenging circumstances and we can also learn something about them and their situation too.  We all are winners!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: i makes some music!!

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher Training.

lenders.name: Philip
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out

lenders.name: Faith
lenders.loan_because: Everyday I wake in the morning only thinking of myself. One day I woke up and wondered what the world would be like if everyone cared for others. I got this kiva gift certificate and thought this is a wonderful way to give back. I hope this dotation will help you.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Pareto would be proud.  Nobody loses here.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the daily and longer term affairs of the Town and Villages within it.
